Please generate a random location card for an adventure game. Attributes to populate:

Place Name: The name of the location.
Terrain: The type of landform in this location.
Flora & Fauna: Types of plants and animals found here.
Hidden Feature: Something not immediately visible or known about the location.
Threat Level: How dangerous is this location?

Place Name: Whispering Willows

Terrain: A dense, ancient forest filled with towering willow trees that have branches that seem to sway and whisper in the wind, even when there is no breeze.

Flora & Fauna: The flora consists mainly of willow trees, but there are also patches of glowing mushrooms and vines that wrap around the tree trunks. Fauna includes elusive shadow cats that blend into the darkness and singbirds that mimic any sound they hear, creating a symphony of echoes.

Hidden Feature: Beneath the roots of the oldest willow tree lies a hidden grotto containing an ancient well. The well water is said to grant wishes to those pure of heart.

Threat Level: Moderate. While the forest appears serene, it's home to mischievous spirits that can lead travelers astray, and the shadow cats are territorial and may attack if provoked.
